--- create_function.sql
CREATE FUNCTION my_func(x INT64, y INT64) RETURNS INT64 AS (x + y)
--- AST
&ast.CreateFunction{
  As:       56,
  RparenAs: 65,
  Name:     &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 16,
        NameEnd: 23,
        Name:    "my_func",
      },
    },
  },
  Params: []*ast.FunctionParam{
    &ast.FunctionParam{
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 24,
        NameEnd: 25,
        Name:    "x",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 26,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
    },
    &ast.FunctionParam{
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 33,
        NameEnd: 34,
        Name:    "y",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 35,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
    },
  },
  ReturnType: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
    NamePos: 50,
    Name:    "INT64",
  },
  Definition: &ast.BinaryExpr{
    Op:   "+",
    Left: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 60,
      NameEnd: 61,
      Name:    "x",
    },
    Right: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 64,
      NameEnd: 65,
      Name:    "y",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE FUNCTION my_func (x INT64, y INT64) RETURNS INT64 AS (x + y)
